colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,('DI SNGAGS GANG MANG BZLAS CHU 'TSOGS MAR SHING LAN BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD SBYIN BDAG GI ZHVA GOS LHAM MI'I NAG PHYUGS BSHAMS, ,NAD RIMS GDON DANG LO ZLA @002B ZHAG DUS SKEG MI SRI LO SRI RGAN SRI KHA YOG MES BSREG RBOD GTONG BYAD 'PHUR GTANG NAN MES BSREG TSOM RKUN 'KHRUGS PA DANG MI PHYUGS RIMS NAD ZHI, ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL LHA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN MING CAN 'CHANG BAS BRIS PA'O, ,ZAB RGYA, SPAS RGYA, DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
